mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no=b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc

select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no=b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{viewCountPerPage }

choose.when: insert into board values(null,#{vo.title },#{vo.contents }, 0, now(), ifnull((select max(g_no) from board a)+1,1), 1, 0, #{vo.userNo })

mapper.update: update board set o_no = o_no+1 where g_no=(select g_no from board a where no=#{parentNo }) and o_no>=(select o_no+1 from board b where no=#{parentNo })
